history.proof: intros net HCE HVC HCC h p e t li pli plt es lc HB HIn HP. unfold CandidateEntries in HCE. destruct HCE as [Hce_host Hce_net]. unfold votes_correct in HVC. destruct HVC as [HOVT [HCCV HCA]]. unfold cronies_correct in HCC. destruct HCC as [Hrc [Hcv [Hvn Hrl]]]. unfold CandidateEntriesLowered. intros h' e' HE'. shelve.

ctx: intros net HCE HVC HCC h p e t li pli plt es lc HB HIn HP.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface net : network Hce_host : candidateEntries_host_invariant (nwState net) Hce_net : candidateEntries_nw_invariant net HVC : votes_correct net HCC : cronies_correct net h : Net.name p : packet e : entry t : term li : name pli : logIndex plt : term es : list entry lc : logIndex HB : pBody p = AppendEntries t li pli plt es lc HIn : In p (nwPackets (deghost net)) HP : In e es The term "net" has type "network" while it is expected to have type "packet".

ctx: intros net HCE HVC HCC h p e t li pli plt es lc HB HIn HP.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface net : network Hce_host : candidateEntries_host_invariant (nwState net) Hce_net : candidateEntries_nw_invariant net HOVT : one_vote_per_term net HCCV : votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct net HCA : currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct net HCC : cronies_correct net h : Net.name p : packet e : entry t : term li : name pli : logIndex plt : term es : list entry lc : logIndex HB : pBody p = AppendEntries t li pli plt es lc HIn : In p (nwPackets (deghost net)) HP : In e es The term "HCC" has type "cronies_correct net" while it is expected to have type "packet".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface
olpti: one_leader_per_term_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, CandidateEntries net -> votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> forall (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (e : entry) (t : term) (li : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (lc : logIndex), pBody p = AppendEntries t li pli plt es lc -> In p (nwPackets (deghost net)) -> In e es -> CandidateEntriesLowered (deghost net) e h

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
term = nat : Set
Record candidate_entries_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_candidate_entries_interface { candidate_entries_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> CandidateEntries net } Arguments candidate_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_candidate_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => one_vote_per_term net /\ votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct net /\ currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
cronies_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => votes_received_cronies net /\ cronies_votes net /\ votes_nw net /\ votes_received_leaders net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
CandidateEntriesLowered = fun (net : network) (e : entry) (h : Net.name) => currentTerm (nwState net h) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived (nwState net h))) = true -> type (nwState net h) <> Candidate : network -> entry -> Net.name -> Prop
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Record votes_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_correct_interface { votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net } Arguments votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant
deghost = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params) (net : network) => {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let H := X in let nwState0 := nwState H in let (_, d) := nwState0 in d end |} : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params), network -> network Arguments deghost {base_params multi_params ghost_params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
CandidateEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => candidateEntries_host_invariant (nwState net) /\ candidateEntries_nw_invariant net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments CandidateEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
logIndex = nat : Set
Record cronies_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_cronies_correct_interface { cronies_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> cronies_correct net } Arguments cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%
Record one_leader_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leader_per_term_interface { one_leader_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leader_per_term net } Arguments one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
SpecLemmas.doLeader_message_entries : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e (log st)
SpecLemmas.doLeader_messages : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (plt = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt))
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
candidate_entries_lowered_rvr' : forall net : network, CandidateEntries net -> votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> forall (p : packet) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> CandidateEntriesLowered_rvr (deghost net) e p
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd = update_elections_data_appendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst...
candidate_entries_lowered' : forall net : network, CandidateEntries net -> votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h'))) -> CandidateEntriesLowered (deghost net) e h
leader_sublog_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) ->...-> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
candidateEntries_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> forall e : entry, In e entries -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments candidateEntries_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
wonElection_candidateEntries_rvr : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (e : entry), votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (snd (nwState net (pDst p))))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) <> Candidate
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
candidate_entries_lowered_rvr : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> forall (p : packet) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h)) -> CandidateEntriesLowered_rvr net e p
msg_ind : forall P : msg -> Prop, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_rec : forall P : msg -> Set, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_rect : forall P : msg -> Type, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_sind : forall P : msg -> SProp, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
candidate_entries_lowered : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h')) -> CandidateEntriesLowered net e h
CandidateEntriesLowered_rvr = fun (net : network) (e : entry) (p : packet) => In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true -> currentTerm (nwState net (pDst p)) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (nwState net (pDst p)))) = true -> type (nwState net (pDst p)) <> Candidate : network -> entry -> packet -> Prop
deghost_packet_exists : forall (net : network) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets (deghost net)) -> exists q : packet, In q (nwPackets net) /\ p = deghost_packet q
ghost_packet : forall (net : network) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> In (deghost_packet p) (nwPackets (deghost net))
leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
votes_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term), pBody p = RequestVoteReply t true -> In p (nwPackets net) -> In (t, pDst p) (votes (fst (nwState net (pSrc p)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_raft_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_refinement_interface
refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
lower_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost net)) -> forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n -> In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries : forall (net : network) (h h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (e : entry), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h (snd (nwState net h)) h' t r -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_requestVoteReply h h' t r (nwState net h), st'))
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```  
intros net HCE HVC HCC h p e t li pli plt es lc HB HIn HP.
unfold CandidateEntries in HCE.
destruct HCE as [Hce_host Hce_net].
specialize (Hce_net net _ _ _ _ HB).  
unfold votes_correct in HVC.
destruct HVC as [HOVT [HCCV HCA]].
assert (Hvi := Hce_net HCC HOVT).
unfold cronies_correct in HCC.
destruct HCC as [Hrc [Hcv [Hvn Hrl]]].
assert (Hcc := Hrc net Hvi).
unfold CandidateEntriesLowered.  
intros h' e' HE'.
apply (leader_sublog_host_invariant _ _ _ net _ e h'); auto.
```

original: intros net HCE HVC HCC h p e t li pli plt es lc HB HIn HP. unfold CandidateEntries in HCE. destruct HCE as [Hce_host Hce_net]. specialize (Hce_net net _ _ _ _ HB). unfold votes_correct in HVC. destruct HVC as [HOVT [HCCV HCA]]. assert (Hvi := Hce_net HCC HOVT). unfold cronies_correct in HCC. destruct HCC as [Hrc [Hcv [Hvn Hrl]]]. assert (Hcc := Hrc net Hvi). unfold CandidateEntriesLowered. intros h' e' HE'. apply (leader_sublog_host_invariant _ _ _ net _ e h'); auto.
